CustomField.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"First Steps Completed") ,ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"Flex Login Completed") ,ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"Prior Payroll Completed") ,ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"Business Information Completed") ,ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"Banking Information Completed") ,ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"Pay Schedule Completed") ,ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"Tax Information Completed") ,ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"Add Employees Completed") ,ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"Documents MSA Received") ,ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"Documents Completed") ,ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"Submit Completed") ,ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"Onboarding Completed") ,ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"First Payroll Run") ,ISPICKVAL(Action__c,"Client Stalled") )
CustomField.label: CSO Milestone?
